About.title: TrustlineChecker
About.lead1: TrustlineChecker is an all-in-one platform that makes account management on the XRP Ledger smarter and safer.
About.lead2: From trustline checks and settings, AccountRoot updates, to wallet security management—all in one place.
About.lead3: Combining reliability and efficiency, we deliver a secure experience to XRPL users worldwide.
About.project1: TrustlineChecker is a global platform that allows users to safely and intuitively manage trustlines and account roots as account management becomes increasingly important with the expansion of the XRPL ecosystem.
About.project2: By fully utilizing XRPL's flexible account settings (e.g., Trust Lines, AccountSet), we meet user needs in growing areas such as DeFi, NFT, and cross-border payments.
About.feature1:
Trustline Management (using account_lines method):
・Add or remove trustlines in just a few clicks
・View trustline status (balance, limit, currency code) in real time
About.feature2:
AccountRoot Management (using account_info method):
・Visualize AccountRoot details (XRP balance, sequence number, flags, etc.)
・Simplify settings changes (e.g., Require Auth, No Freeze, Domain)
About.feature3:
Global Optimization:
・Multilingual interface (Arabic, English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese) supported
